code: import axios from'axios';export var showPostCommentList=function showPostCommentList(postId,page){return axios.get("http://15.164.170.252:8080/api/post/".concat(postId,"/comment/list/?page=").concat(page,"&size=10"),{withCredentials:true});};export var writeComment=function writeComment(_ref){var id=_ref.id,content=_ref.content;return axios.post("http://15.164.170.252:8080/api/post/".concat(id,"/comment/register"),{content:content},{withCredentials:true});};export var modifyComment=function modifyComment(_ref2){var id=_ref2.id,content=_ref2.content;return axios.put("http://15.164.170.252:8080/api/post/comment/".concat(id,"/edit"),{content:content},{withCredentials:true});};export var deleteComment=function deleteComment(id){return axios.delete("http://15.164.170.252:8080/api/post/comment/".concat(id,"/remove"),{withCredentials:true});};export var getCommentNum=function getCommentNum(id){return axios.get("http://15.164.170.252:8080/api/post/".concat(id,"/comment/count"),{withCredentials:true});};
